name: Glacier 2 Engine Resource Package
summary: An RPKG file is a game archive used by various video games using IO Interactiveâ€™s Glacier 2 Engine, most notably the Hitman series. It contains assets, such as textures, 3-D models, sounds, maps, scripts, and dialogue, that the game loads while you play. The Resource Package (RPKG) format helps the engine organize content and speeds up loading times.
